name: @measure_in2out
author: AFNI Developers
description: Compute thickness of mask using in2out method.

inputs.description: Surface dataset onto which to map thickness (probably a pial/gray matter surface).
inputs.name: Surface dataset

inputs.description: Output directory. If not specified, in2out_thickdir is used.
inputs.name: Output directory

inputs.description: Resample input to mm in millimeters (put a number here). Set this to half a voxel or "auto". No resampling is done by default. Resampling is highly recommended for most 1mm data.
inputs.name: Resample input

inputs.description: Test thickness at increments of sub-voxel distance. Default is 1/4 voxel minimum distance (in-plane).
inputs.name: Increment in millimeters

inputs.description: Smooth surface map of thickness by mm millimeters. Default is 6 mm.
inputs.name: Surface smoothing in millimeters

inputs.description: Search for maximum thickness value of mm millimeters. Default is 6 mm.
inputs.name: Maximum thickness in millimeters

inputs.description: Map to surface by looking for max along mm millimeter normal vectors. Default is 3 mm.
inputs.name: Depth search in millimeters

inputs.description: Use v1 for value of mask, v2 and v3 for inside and outside mask values (e.g., '1 -2 -1').
inputs.name: Mask inside and outside values

inputs.description: Do not delete the intermediate files (for testing).
inputs.name: Keep temporary files

inputs.description: Heat method used for smoothing surfaces. Default is HEAT_07 but HEAT_05 is also useful for some models.
inputs.name: Surface smoothing method

inputs.description: Use FreeSurfer SUMA directory from @SUMA_Make_Spec_FS for processing.
inputs.name: FreeSurfer SUMA directory

output-files.description: Volumetric thickness/distance from in to out
output-files.name: Thickness distance file

output-files.description: Volumetric distance to inside and outside in 2 volumes
output-files.name: Inside and outside distance file

output-files.description: Unsmoothed thickness mapped to surface nodes
output-files.name: Unsmoothed surface thickness file

output-files.description: Smoothed thickness mapped to surface nodes
output-files.name: Smoothed surface thickness file

output-files.description: Simple specification file for surface to use with suma commands
output-files.name: Quick specification file
